Html:
Can anyone tell me if a PHP API similar to that found in DocumentFormat.OpenXml.Packaging for .NET is being developed?

Thanks!

Yes and no... The packaging part is really incorporated into PHPExcel and not standalone. Using PHPExcel, you can create SpreadsheetML packages, but not manipulate them directly at XML level.

Checkout this project: http://openxmlapi.codeplex.com (source code tab)
It contains something similar to .NET packaging for PHP.
